attributes.action: We the British people demand a referendum on the EU treaty!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a sad day for democracy when more than half of the men and women elected by us, do not listen to what we ask for and also break their promises on a technicality. We demand a referendum on the EU treaty, we believe that the reason the government has broken their word is because they will lose. We believe that the government should remember that they are our servants and they are not their to dictate to us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
